title: Which champ is good for dueling?
body:
So I’m a jungle main and I suck at dueling in midlane (as in those custom 1v1s) 
pls help

replies.body:
oh i meant like the custom 1v1s like you make a custom game 
and then you fight your friend. 
sorry for the wrong use of words
{{champion:56}}  he's got a good 1v1, but he's not amazing as a jg
you forgetting {{champion:19}} ? damage reduction, a fear, atkspeed, tankiness, outlifesteals basically anyone except olaf, massive base damage, a supression, and just very high consistent damage.
Any champ you are good with is better than any champ you aren't good with.
Malzahar is also a great duelist, you can just safe farm until 6 and then absolutely destroy the enemy (or at least significantly chunk them to near death) with your ult combo.
Oh cool I might buy fedora!
